law.catch_line: Department of Corrections to update database within thirty days of receipt of information from certain levels.
law.text:
The Department of Corrections shall update their own database within thirty (30) days of receipt of information. The update shall include information from the:
Offender level;
Institutional level; and
Informational and evaluational level.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 25, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1986.
